scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix shared-types && npm install --prefix host && npm install --prefix remote1 && npm install --prefix remote2
scripts.link:types: cd shared-types && npm link && cd ../host && npm link @company/shared-types && cd ../remote1 && npm link @company/shared-types && cd ../remote2 && npm link @company/shared-types
scripts.dev: npm run build:types && npx concurrently "cd remote1 && npm run dev" "cd remote2 && npm run dev" "cd host && npm run dev"
scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build --prefix remote1 && npm run build --prefix remote2 && npm run build --prefix host
